name: Roberto Pla
description: '''Roberto Pla''' (born February 13, 1947) is a Colombian [[percussionist]] and bandleader based in London, England. Primarily a ''[[timbalero]]'', he is best known for his contribution to the [[Latin American music|Latin music]] scene in the [[United Kingdom]]. He has toured with [[Carlos "Patato" Valdés]], [[Alfredo Rodríguez]] and [[Adalberto Santiago]], among others.
